products.title: Orient Faux Silk Ebony Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This ebony faux-silk roman blind, introduces a bold blackshade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

products.title: Lattice Black Roman Blind
products.description: Wonderfully bold, the lattice black roman blind brings a somewhat classical vibe into your home, with a touch of mediterranean influence. The sharpness of the black mixed with the velvety texture of the pattern makes this blind a smart-looking choice. Its soft enough though to d wonderfully bold, the lattice black roman blind brings a somewhat classical vibe into your home, with a touch of mediterranean influence.

products.title: Candy Stripe Jet Roman Blind
products.description: As crisp and smart as a pinstripe suit, the candy stripe jet has bags of minimalist style and a sharp modern look, wrapped in the form of a sumptuously luxurious roman blind. The tonal palette finishes that look perfectly, clean lines of pure black and white the perfect choice fo as crisp and smart as a pinstripe suit, the candy stripe jet has bags of minimalist style and a sharp modern look, wrapped in the form of a sumptuously luxurious roman blind.

products.title: Lilium, Ebony - Roman Blind
products.description: A jet black background takes centre stage in the pretty lilium ebony, covered in sweet, traditional florals with an oriental look and feel. The fabric is one of their smoothest, silky to the touch, making it the perfect suppleness for folding into a gentle roman blind drape. Use the ebony to create a beautifully elegant bedroom decor scheme, placing it against a soft, pinky cream to match that of the fabric.

products.title: Tulipa, Ebony - Roman Blind
products.description: Already a vintage-styled range, the tulipa's ebony is even more so, with a faded, pencil-sketched look featuring the softest of greys. The antique white base forms a pretty backdrop, like aged paper, letting the grey florals do all the talking. Fashion a serene haven in the master bedroom by using the ebony as a subtle central feature. Stick to a matching cream or stone grey paint for the walls, and keep every tone in the room hushed and discreet.

products.title: Faux Suede, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in black offers a more luxurious take on monochromatic minimalism, with its lightweight, soft-feel fabric and jet black hue, and the suppleness of the cloth means it folds gorgeously into neat roman pleats. The stark shade of the black will look stunning against white walls and lime soft furnishings in a contemporary living room or home office. Keep furniture to clean, modern lines and scatter splashes of lime throughout the room.

products.title: Puffin, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: The soft fabric of puffin black works in perfect harmony with the jet black used to catch the eye. As you look closer you'll see how the whites and browns flow into one another to create a print that is reminiscent of the characterful paintings and pictures we all love to have around the home. Add a few coastal-inspired prints to your living room to create a theme that will live long in the memory.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a classic monochrome colour palette, the scandi sprig noir displays sweet sprigs of foliage in ice white and pale dove grey on a jet black background, resulting in a striking and unique aesthetic that's sure to draw the eye. Create a monochrome home study by including the noir along with pale grey or white walls and accessorising with black and white furniture in a contemporary style. Go for black and white photography for your wall art for a retro feel.

products.title: Forest Leaves, Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a contemporary colour scheme of black and yellow, the forest leaves noir displays a foliage display of patterned leaves, featuring stripes, spots, and more. The white background offsets the bold hues perfectly, allowing them to stand out loud and proud. Team the noir with pale grey walls - or pale lemon if you can't resist colour - and go for monochrome prints on the walls for a sleek and sophisticated look.

products.title: Nordic, Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: In true monochrome style, the nordic noir features a start, jet black and the iciest of whites, both displayed in a contemporary floral pattern featuring both blossoms and foliage. The look is cool, calm, and collected, and will look fantastic in a range of colour schemes. Go bold or go home by adding the noir to a lime, black, and white colour scheme in your home office. Paint a feature wall in zesty lime, and opt for black and white furniture with clean lines and a modern finish, using lime to accent with cushions, throws, and wall art.

products.title: Maurice, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: The pure ebony of the maurice in black provides a bold statement to an otherwise forgiving and opulent cloth. This is a modern blind made from fine, silky threads to form a grand design with a distinctive and contemporary colour. Combine the striking black with a vibrant burst of teal or emerald for a modern look with reviving colour, forming a welcoming and cosy style by including equally elaborate fabrics with rich and restful textures.

products.title: Basketweave, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: In striking ebony, the basketweave black offers a cool, contemporary colour on a contrastingly warm, traditional fabric. The criss-cross weave and thick thread make the blind sturdy and textured, though still surprisingly nimble. Use the black as a more conspicuous neutral, setting it against a bright lime or cobalt blue to tame the wild shades. Either would make an impactful colour scheme for a contemporary living room or bedroom when accented with matching bedlinen, wall art, and fun ornaments.

products.title: William Morris Fruit Ebony Roman Blind
products.description: Bold, bright and beautiful, this fruit ebony roman blind, from their v&a collection of william morris designs, is a great way of adding a classical design touch to your scheme. This design dates back to around 1862 and is steeped in history, but still looks equally as contempo bold, bright and beautiful, this fruit ebony roman blind, from their v&a collection of william morris designs, is a great way of adding a classical design touch to your scheme.

products.title: William Morris Compton Noir Roman Blind
products.description: If youre looking for impeccable design then youve come to the right place. In collaboration with the v&a, their william morris collection offers you a plethora of exceptional designs across a huge palette of classic and contemporary colours. The compton noir roman blind is a if youre looking for impeccable design then youve come to the right place.

products.title: Windsor, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

products.title: Nova, Ebony - Roman Blind
products.description: In muted jet black, the nova ebony has a classically chic feel, adding to by the delicate zigzag texturing of the moccasin-like fabric. The cloth is easy and soft, blending perfectly into the effortless folds of the roman. Craft a cool and trendy ambience in a teenager's bedroom by including the ebony amongst neon shades of pink, lime, yellow, or orange, or any combination of those shades if you're feeling extra brave.

products.title: Kent, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: For a contemporary design, with a classical finish, try the kent black. Softly stitched texturing gives it a relaxed and cosy feel, whilst the jet black shade offers a stark modern edge. The fabric falls beautifully into the soft curves of the blind, forming a look of character and depth. Modern style can be just as luxurious as traditional, so create a sumptuous monochrome mode in the living room by teaming the black with soft white walls, dove grey furnishings, and silver finishings.
